void setup_tsurf ( SIM_T *  simu  ) 

Setup tilted surface (M3) by ray tracing from the tilted surface to WFS and Science grid.

Todo:
Merge setup_tsurf, setup_surf, and setup_powfs_ncpa. Be careful about which NCPA is compensated by WFS offsets. setup_tsurf and setup_surf act on surfaces intersect with most WFS and science, while setup_powfs_ncpa act on individual surfaces for each WFS. Maybe it is good idea to keep them separate. 
00035                              {
00036     const PARMS_T *parms=simu->parms;
00037     POWFS_T *powfs=simu->powfs;
00038     if(parms->ntsurf<=0) return;
00039     info("Setting up tilt surface (M3)\n");
00040     if(!parms->sim.cachesurf){
00041     error("Not yet finished\n");
00042     }
00043     if(!simu->surfwfs){
00044     simu->surfwfs=dcellnew(parms->nwfs,1);
00045     }
00046     if(!simu->surfevl){
00047     simu->surfevl=dcellnew(parms->evl.nevl,1);
00048     }
00049  
00050     simu->tsurf=calloc(parms->ntsurf, sizeof(RECTMAP_T*));
00051     for(int itsurf=0; itsurf<parms->ntsurf; itsurf++){
00052     char *fn=find_file(parms->tsurf[itsurf]);
00053     info("Loading tilt surface from %s\n", fn);
00054     simu->tsurf[itsurf]=rectmapread("%s",fn); 
00055     free(fn);
00056     }
00057     if(!parms->sim.cachesurf){
00058     return;
00059     }
00060 
00061     LOC_T *locevl;
00062     const double rot=-parms->aper.rotdeg/180.*M_PI;
00063     int do_rot=(fabs(rot)>1.e-10);
00064 
00065     if(do_rot){
00066     locevl=locdup(simu->aper->locs);
00067     locrot(locevl,rot);
00068     }else{
00069     locevl=simu->aper->locs;
00070     }
00071 
00072     for(int itsurf=0; itsurf<parms->ntsurf; itsurf++){
00073     const double alx=simu->tsurf[itsurf]->txdeg/180*M_PI;
00074     const double aly=simu->tsurf[itsurf]->tydeg/180*M_PI;
00075     const double ftel=simu->tsurf[itsurf]->ftel;
00076     const double fexit=simu->tsurf[itsurf]->fexit;
00077     const double fsurf=simu->tsurf[itsurf]->fsurf;
00078     const double mag=fexit/ftel;
00079     const double scalex=-mag;
00080     const double scaley=mag;
00081     const double scaleopd=-2;
00082     const double het=fexit-fsurf;//distance between exit pupil and M3.
00083     RECTMAP_T *mapsurf=simu->tsurf[itsurf];
00084 
00085     for(int ievl=0; ievl<parms->evl.nevl; ievl++){
00086         if(!simu->surfevl->p[ievl]){
00087         simu->surfevl->p[ievl]=dnew(simu->aper->locs->nloc, 1);
00088         }
00089         double bx=parms->evl.thetax[ievl]/mag;//2010-04-02: do not put - sign
00090         double by=parms->evl.thetay[ievl]/mag;
00091         double d_img_exit=fexit;
00092         proj_rect_grid(mapsurf,alx,aly,locevl,scalex,scaley,
00093                NULL,simu->surfevl->p[ievl]->p,scaleopd,
00094                d_img_exit, het, bx,by);
00095     }
00096 
00097     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<parms->nwfs; iwfs++){
00098         int ipowfs=parms->wfs[iwfs].powfs;
00099         int ilocm=0;
00100         if(powfs[ipowfs].locm && powfs[ipowfs].nlocm>1){//misregistration.
00101         ilocm=parms->powfs[ipowfs].indwfs[iwfs];
00102         }
00103         double hs=parms->powfs[ipowfs].hs;
00104         LOC_T *locwfs, *locwfsin;
00105         if(!simu->surfwfs->p[iwfs]){
00106         simu->surfwfs->p[iwfs]=dnew(simu->powfs[ipowfs].npts,1);
00107         }
00108         if(powfs[ipowfs].locm){
00109         locwfsin=powfs[ipowfs].locm[ilocm];
00110         }else{
00111         locwfsin=powfs[ipowfs].loc;
00112         }
00113         if(do_rot){
00114         locwfs=locdup(locwfsin);
00115         locrot(locwfs,rot);
00116         }else{
00117         locwfs=locwfsin;
00118         }
00119 
00120         double d_img_focus=1./(1./ftel-1./hs)-ftel;
00121         //info2("iwfs%d: d_img_focus=%g\n",iwfs,d_img_focus);
00122         double d_img_exit=fexit+d_img_focus;
00123         
00124         //2010-04-02: do not put - sign
00125         double bx=parms->wfs[iwfs].thetax*(d_img_focus+ftel)/d_img_exit;
00126         double by=parms->wfs[iwfs].thetay*(d_img_focus+ftel)/d_img_exit;
00127         proj_rect_grid(mapsurf,alx,aly,locwfs,scalex,scaley,
00128                NULL,simu->surfwfs->p[iwfs]->p,scaleopd,
00129                d_img_exit, het, bx, by);
00130         
00131         if(do_rot){
00132         locfree(locwfs);
00133         }
00134     }
00135     
00136         dcellwrite(simu->surfwfs,"surfwfs.bin");
00137     dcellwrite(simu->surfevl,"surfevl.bin");
00138     //exit(0);
00139     
00140     }
00141     if(do_rot){
00142     locfree(locevl);
00143     }
00144     if(parms->sim.cachesurf){
00145     for(int itsurf=0; itsurf<parms->ntsurf; itsurf++){
00146         rectmapfree(simu->tsurf[itsurf]);
00147     }
00148     }
00149 }

void setup_surf ( SIM_T *  simu  ) 

Setup surface perpendicular to the beam by ray tracing from the surface to WFS and Science grid. 

00154                            {
00155     const PARMS_T *parms=simu->parms;
00156     POWFS_T *powfs=simu->powfs;
00157     if(parms->nsurf<=0){
00158     info2("There are no surface map\n");
00159     return;
00160     }else{
00161     info2("Setting up surface OPD (M1/M2/M3)\n");
00162     }
00163     if(!parms->sim.cachesurf){
00164     error("Not yet finished\n");
00165     }
00166     if(!simu->surfwfs){
00167     simu->surfwfs=dcellnew(parms->nwfs,1);
00168     }
00169     if(!simu->surfevl){
00170     simu->surfevl=dcellnew(parms->evl.nevl,1);
00171     }
00172     simu->surf=calloc(parms->nsurf, sizeof(MAP_T*));
00173     for(int isurf=0; isurf<parms->nsurf; isurf++){
00174     if(!parms->surf[isurf]) continue;
00175     char *fn=find_file(parms->surf[isurf]);
00176     info("Loading surface OPD from %s\n", fn);
00177     simu->surf[isurf]=sqmapread("%s",fn); free(fn);
00178     }
00179     if(!parms->sim.cachesurf){
00180     return;
00181     }
00182 
00183     LOC_T *locevl;
00184     const double rot=-parms->aper.rotdeg/180.*M_PI;
00185     int do_rot=(fabs(rot)>1.e-10);
00186     if(do_rot){
00187     locevl=locdup(simu->aper->locs);
00188     locrot(locevl,rot);
00189     }else{
00190     locevl=simu->aper->locs;
00191     }
00192     
00193   
00194     for(int isurf=0; isurf<parms->nsurf; isurf++){
00195     if(!simu->surf[isurf]) continue;
00196     double hl=simu->surf[isurf]->h;
00197     for(int ievl=0; ievl<parms->evl.nevl; ievl++){
00198         if(!simu->surfevl->p[ievl]){
00199         simu->surfevl->p[ievl]=dnew(simu->aper->locs->nloc, 1);
00200         }
00201         double displacex=parms->evl.thetax[ievl]*hl;
00202         double displacey=parms->evl.thetay[ievl]*hl;
00203         
00204         if(do_rot){
00205         prop_grid(simu->surf[isurf], locevl, simu->surfevl->p[ievl]->p, 
00206               1, displacex, displacey, 1, 0, 0, 0);
00207         }else{
00208         prop_grid_stat(simu->surf[isurf], simu->aper->locs_stat, 
00209                    simu->surfevl->p[ievl]->p, 
00210                    1, displacex, displacey, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1);
00211         }
00212     }
00213     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<parms->nwfs; iwfs++){
00214         int ipowfs=parms->wfs[iwfs].powfs;
00215         int ilocm=0;
00216         if(powfs[ipowfs].locm && powfs[ipowfs].nlocm>1){//misregistration.
00217         ilocm=parms->powfs[ipowfs].indwfs[iwfs];
00218         }
00219         double hs=parms->powfs[ipowfs].hs;
00220         const double scale=1.-hl/hs;
00221         const double displacex=parms->wfs[iwfs].thetax*hl;
00222         const double displacey=parms->wfs[iwfs].thetay*hl;
00223         if(!simu->surfwfs->p[iwfs]){
00224         simu->surfwfs->p[iwfs]=dnew(simu->powfs[ipowfs].npts,1);
00225         }
00226         LOC_T *locwfs, *locwfsin;
00227         if(powfs[ipowfs].locm){
00228         locwfsin=powfs[ipowfs].locm[ilocm];
00229         }else{
00230         locwfsin=powfs[ipowfs].loc;
00231         }
00232         if(do_rot){
00233         locwfs=locdup(locwfsin);
00234         locrot(locwfs,rot);
00235         }else{
00236         locwfs=locwfsin;
00237         }
00238         prop_grid(simu->surf[isurf], locwfs, simu->surfwfs->p[iwfs]->p, 
00239               1, displacex, displacey, scale, 1., 0, 0); 
00240         if(do_rot){
00241         locfree(locwfs);
00242         }
00243     }
00244     }
00245     if(do_rot){
00246     locfree(locevl);
00247     }
00248     if(parms->sim.cachesurf){
00249     sqmaparrfree(simu->surf, parms->nsurf);
00250     }
00251 }
